Detailed Description

Stack memory allocator

StackMem object allows a stack allocation of bytes.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

Alignment on this machine

Enumerator:

void* RFO::StackMem::overflow ( size_t  size  )  [protected]

Call to signal overflow of the stack This method is invoked when allocate cannot allocate the requested bloc size. The return value is the value returned by the allocate method.

Parameters:
size is the size of the request bloc
Return values:
the value returned to the allocate invocation
